text: Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 are role-playing video games in the Pokémon series made by Game Freak and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS. The games are the sequels to 2010's Pokémon Black and White. The games were released in Japan on June 23, 2012, in North America on October 7, 2012, in Australia on October 11, 2012, and in Europe on October 12, 2012. ==Gameplay== Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 play the same as the previous games in the series. Unlike in Black and White, players may now capture Pokémon from previous games from the start. ==Plot== Pokémon Black 2 and White 2 follows a new Pokémon trainer who is on a journey to become a Pokémon master. They do this by catching and training Pokémon, and battling Pokémon trainers. It takes place in the Unova region two years after the events of Black and White. During this time, there have been many changes. Changes include new areas to explore, new gym leaders, and new trainers to battle. There is also a new Team Plasma that was formed after the original team was defeated. The new Team Plasma aims to use Pokémon to take over Unova. During the player's journey, they will meet former members of the original Team Plasma. These members now use Pokémon for good, and help the player in their journey. ==Protagonists== Gender Name Male Nate Female Rosa ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2012 video games Category:Pokémon RPGs Category:Game Freak games Category:Nintendo DS-only games Category:Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection games Category:Video game sequels
title: Pokémon Black 2 and White 2
